radiographic_examinations.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions, multiple large calculi within the gallbladder, no gallbladder wall thickening, no focal liver lesions, pancreas divisum, normal CBD containing a plastic stent, no intrahepatic biliary dilatation, a 13 x 13 mm enhancing mass arising exophytically from the ampulla, normal caliber pancreatic duct, diffuse fatty replacement of pancreatic parenchyma, a 6-mm T2 bright focus in pancreatic uncinate tip, a smaller 3mm T2 bright focus in pancreatic head, two 9-mm right parapelvic cysts, a 9-mm lower pole simple cyst in the left kidney, otherwise normal kidneys and adrenal glands.
